summary: Frontend testing completed for three new pages: TasksPage, HandoffPage, and PartnerConfigPage. All pages load correctly with proper UI components, tabs, dialogs, and navigation.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All three new frontend pages (Tasks, Handoff, Partner Config) are working correctly. Navigation from sidebar works. All tabs, dialogs, and interactive elements function as expected.

tests: Page loads with data-testid='tasks-page'
My Tasks tab present and clickable
All Tasks tab present and clickable
SLA Monitor tab present and clickable
Summary cards show Overdue Tasks, Due Today, Upcoming, SLA Breaches counts
New Task button opens create dialog
Create dialog has Title, Description, Type, Priority, Due Date fields
SLA Monitor tab shows Compliant, At Risk, Breached counts
SLA Configuration section displays
Page loads with data-testid='handoff-page'
Pending tab present and clickable
Active tab present and clickable
Done tab present and clickable
Summary cards show Awaiting Handoff, In Progress, Completed, Won Deals Value
Deal list panel displays
Details panel shows placeholder when no deal selected
Page loads with data-testid='partner-config-page'
Partner list displays (5 partners found)
Selecting partner shows configuration panel
KPIs tab shows Win Rate, Avg Deal Size, Qualification Rate metrics
Pipeline tab shows Stage Mappings and Skipped Stages
Fields tab present and clickable
Compliance tab shows compliance status and rules
Edit Config button available
Tasks & SLAs nav item in sidebar - navigates to /tasks
Handoff nav item in sidebar - navigates to /handoff
Partner Config nav item in sidebar - navigates to /partner-config
